title: discover balance
author: Discover Balance
description: Acupuncture, Floating, Infrared Sauna, Massage, Energy healing...Vancouver's new center for health and well being.
cleaned_text: We are all about you! Our space is designed for you and our goal is to welcome you to a place where you can heal, rejuvenate, find insights and your path to health. Acupuncture in Vancouver could not get easier. We have late appointments Tuesday thru Friday and acupuncture on Saturdays as well. Our friendly practitioners are gentle and effective with over 20 years of experience. We are delighted to bring the therapeutic benefits of the float to Vancouver. Our float rooms are designed for your comfort in every way. Come explore your new favorite happy place. We enjoy meeting new people from all walks of life and sharing what our special place here has to offer.
